actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Durenberger. With written report No. 98-475.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 912.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1985.

summary.text: Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1985 for: (1) grants to State programs; and (2) carrying out other specified provisions of such Act.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1985.
